definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: boil, seethe (intr.), grow ripe (Aram. [[בְּשַׁל]], b4el ripen, Nas. b4al boil, NSyr. bo4el be boiled, cooked, cf. As. bašâlu (bašlu, cooked) Zim:BP 76)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[בָּשַׁל]] Joe 4:13, [[בָּֽשְׁלוּ]] Ez Eze 24:5; —boil, cook (intr.) Ez Eze 24:5; grow ripe (of [[קחיר]]) Joe 4:13; —

boil (tr.) obj. om. Nu 11:8, [[בָּשָׂר]] 1Sa 2:13; [[גְּדִי]] Ex 23:19, Ex 34:26, De 14:21; [[נזיד]] 2Ki 4:38; of offerings, obj. [[הקדשׁים]] 2Ch 35:13; obj. [[אשׁם]] Ez Eze 46:20, [[זבח]] Ez Eze 46:24 (no obj.) v:Eze 46:24, cf. Zec 14:21 (no obj.); Ex 16:23, Ex 16:23 opp. [[אפה]] bake.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: (general), obj. [[בשׂר]] 1Ki 19:21, Ex 29:31, Le 8:31 (both P); obj. [[בֵּן]] 2Ki 6:29 cf. [[יֶלֶד]] La 4:10; hence also of [[הפסח]] De 16:7 (cf. Di; ‖ Ex 12:8, Ex 12:9 has [[חְלִי]] [[אֵשׁ]] opp. [[מְבֻשָּׁל בַּמַּיִם]]) 2Ch 35:13 ([[בָּאֵשׁ]]), cakes ([[הלבבות]]) 2Sa 13:8.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[בֻּשָָּׁלָה]] Le 6:21; Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּכֻשַּׁל־]] Le 6:21; Pt. [[מְבֻשָּׁל]] Ex 12:9, 1Sa 2:15; —be boiled, sodden, [[במים]] Ex 12:9 cf. Le 6:21, Le 6:21 (all P) 1Sa 2:15.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִבְשִׁילוּ]] ripened, brought to ripeness Ge 40:10 (a vine, its grape-clusters).
